caption.p: Effects of marjoram essential oil (EO), chitosan, ascorbic acid (AA) alone, and their combinations on fresh-cut lettuce ( A) aroma (scale range from 1—lettuce like to 5—not lettuce, not acceptable) and ( B) color/visual quality (scale: 1—green; 3—light discoloration; 5—severe browning) after 6 days of storage at 7 °C and 90% RH. Values represent means of evaluations made by 7 untrained panelists.
